room_title: Escape room "The Lost Kingdom" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
room_address: 1826 E Platte Ave Suite 200 Colorado Springs, CO 80909
room_description: The Lost Kingdom brings the adventure of a remote island radiating a powerful energy source that must be investigated before the island sinks into the sea. Dr. Bonedigger has been missing for quite some time and feared dead. You and your team must find him (or his remains) and the invaluable energy source of the ancients.
